cocktails.name: Mojito
ingredients: light rum, lime juice, sugar, mint, soda water
cocktails.instructions: Muddle mint leaves with sugar and lime juice. Add a splash of soda water and fill the glass with cracked ice. Pour the rum and top with soda water. Garnish and serve with straw.

cocktails.name: Old Fashioned
cocktails.instructions: Place sugar cube in old fashioned glass and saturate with bitters, add a dash of plain water. Muddle until dissolved. Fill the glass with ice cubes and add whiskey. Garnish with orange twist, and a cocktail cherry.

cocktails.name: Whiskey Sour
cocktails.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into chilled glass, garnish and serve. If served 'On the rocks', strain ingredients into old-fashioned glass filled with ice.

cocktails.name: Margarita
cocktails.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into chilled glass, gasrnish and serve. If served 'On the rocks', strain ingredients into old-fashioned glass filled with ice.
